name: HornHunt
description:
A short, sweet, adventure platformer following the young John Hornhunt on a quest to prove his place on the throne to his father. Explore new lands and defeat magical beasts, obtaining new powerful horn sets to unlock new powers and areas of the world.

(KEYBOARD)

Arrow keys to move

Hold C to open the Horn select menu, arrow keys to chose new horn set, release C

(Selecting horns will only work if the horn set is unlocked)

Pressing Z and/or X will activate each horn set's special ability.

Pressing V while standing over the shop will open it. SHIFT to purchase selected object.

(CONTROLLER)

A=jump

X=First ability (punching without any horns equipped)

B=Secondary ability (only with horns equipped)

Hold Y and use the right or left trigger (or movement controls) to select a new horn set, release Y to confirm.

Right bumper to open shop when standing in front of it

Right trigger to crouch

Save the game by standing in front of the pedestal at the beginning of the game.
